byline.contributor: Poypiti Amatatham contributed reporting from Bangkok.

snippet: Passenger and cargo traffic was halted after Thai border police heard gunfire, found two Chinese cargo vessels adrift with drugs and one body — and then 11 floating bodies.
lead_paragraph: Passenger and cargo traffic was halted after Thai border police heard gunfire, found two Chinese cargo vessels adrift with drugs and one body — and then 11 floating bodies.

headline.main: China Suspends Boat Traffic on Mekong
headline.print_headline: After Attack, China Halts Boat Traffic on Mekong River
headline.seo: China Suspends Boat Traffic on Mekong
